Subject: Re: Introducing Redhot (New character)
References: <9fs1h9+cte6@...>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Firedrill looks at Prowl, questions in his eyes, the look, of someone
who wants to say something, but dosent know if he should. He then opens
his lips, as if to start, then looks towards the ground, with a downcast
look. He rubs his fingers together indicissevly, then folds down,
transforming, and drives off, a scream of rage falling out of his
vocals, as they then become engulfed by a siren he turns on.
